validity_domain: 0-D global confinement scalings envelope, regime-conditioned by a deterministic Martin-2008 P_LH proxy. H-mode envelope uses IPB98(y,2) as the primary reference; L-mode envelope uses ITER89-P / Kaye-Goldston / Neo-Alcator comparators. Governance/screening aid only; not a transport solve.
notes: Defines which confinement scalings participate in the v371 envelope by regime. Numerical uncertainty is represented explicitly by user caps on H_required (optimistic/robust).
